SELECT r.id AS id, r.has_number AS hasNumber, r.need_number AS needNumber, r.create_time AS createTime, r.script AS script, r.STATUS AS STATUS, r.id AS roomId, r.host_id AS hostId, r.start_time AS startTime, r.category_id AS categoryId, r.end_time AS endTime, s.script_name AS scriptName FROM room r LEFT JOIN script s ON s.id = r.script WHERE r.script = #{scriptId} AND r.STATUS = 1
